prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon with delicate wings and vibrant flower-like features.
Design a small Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with bright colors and floral accents.
Imagine a whimsical creature that thrives in gardens and has a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a flower spirit, showcasing bright colors and a gentle demeanor.
Show me a tiny Pokemon with a floral theme, combining elements of grace and charm.
Give me a nature-loving Pokemon with a colorful appearance and a friendly disposition.
Make a Pokemon that blends floral aesthetics with a magical aura, perfect for enchanting gardens.
